title: Clipboard content should be persistent
body: The Clipboard content for example a file copied in the Clipbord get lost if the the App is closed but it should be persistent.

comments.body: If you do change this, please also allow clipboard access from the background: https://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/110705-universal-windows-platform/suggestions/33131215-full-clipboard-access-in-background-unfocused-app as we're using this in order to clear the clipboard from the background and changing this will break our app.
